Description:
Executive home, deluxe lifestyle
Showcasing a graceful style with luxury finishes, this master-built townhouse is spectacular in both proportion and appeal. It's set toward the rear of a boutique block and is conveniently located footsteps from transport with the Eastfield road shops only a short stroll away. An open plan design dominated by spotted gum timber floors, crisp white decor and an elegant floorplan allowing for a relaxed modern lifestyle.
Reflecting a sophisticated style of living the interiors offer a lounge and dining with access onto a paved entertaining space surrounded by gardens. It features a stylish kitchen boasting stone benchtops with gourmet De Dietrich appliances while each of the generous bedrooms offer personal robes with a lower lever master complete with walk-in-robe and ensuite. There is an upper level retreat, separate study, guest powder room, working laundry, lots of internal storage, ducted heating and cooling, surround sound system, home cinema projector screen, security alarm, water tank and a double garage with a drive through parking area for a boat or caravan.
An exceptional property with nothing to spend, it boasts easy access to parklands, a selection of top schools and the Eastlink allowing for an effortless commute into the CBD.
